doc: SAL indices of scripts on the queue.

fields.doc: Timestamp when the Kafka message was created.
fields.name: kafka_timestamp

fields.doc: Is the ScriptQueue CSC enabled? New scripts will only be started if both `running` and `enable` are True.
fields.name: enabled

fields.doc: Is the queue running (True) or paused (False)? New scripts will only be started if both `running` and `enable` are True.
fields.name: running

fields.doc: SAL index of script being run; 0 if none.
fields.name: currentSalIndex

fields.doc: Number of valid entries in salIndices.
fields.name: length

fields.doc: SAL index of each Script on the queue. Item 0 is the next script to be run.
fields.name: salIndices

fields.doc: Number of valid entries in pastSalIndices.
fields.name: pastLength

fields.doc: SAL index of scripts that have been run. Item 0 is the script most recently run.
fields.name: pastSalIndices

name: ScriptQueue_logevent_queue
